ComicInfo.Title: The Death of Snake Eyes, Part 4
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: The Death of Snake Eyes, Part 4: Throwdown has been left disfigured and muted. Hawk asks Sean to fake his death and assume Snake Eye's identity, lest Cobra learn Snake Eyes was killed. As Snake Eyes, Sean goes to Snake Eyes' cabin with Scarlett. Cobra sends Night Creepers to attack them but a squad of Joes helps Sean win the fight to encourage Cobra's belief in Snake Eyes' survival. The Collins family goes to Sean's funeral, alerting Cobra of their whereabouts; Firefly blows up the Collins house.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 03:49:25. [CVDB493068] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 10:20:18. [Issue ID 1422505]
